dialogues.text: How are we going to find them? Any idea what an Archanan looks like? And then -- they see -- AMID THE SEA OF GUYS IN SUITS, HATS, AND SKINNY TIES...

A circle of what looks like Tibetan monks -- colorful, playful, dressed in robes. They could only be -- the Archanans. The group comprises one older Archanan -- the LAMA -- and three younger ATTENDANTS. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I found them. They step into

dialogues.speaker: THE ARCHANANS' AURA
dialogues.text: Within the space around the Archanans, the chaos and nois the crowd melts away. Deflected. There are three Archanans and one distinctive older one - THE LAMA. In the middle -- a giant pile of winnings. All is peaceful within this space. Faint chimes. They greet Jay and Kay happily, chant a strange mantra: ARCHANANS (CHANTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: King Lady Big Trouble Classy... The faint sound of an announcer:

dialogues.speaker: ANNOUNCER, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Results for the sixth race: King, Sweet Sophie, Big Trouble and Red Gent! ARCHANANS (CHANTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Superba pays 3200 to one... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're in danger-- ARCHANANS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're in danger... you're in danger... Jay thinks they're playing the "echo game" like little ki JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Very cute, but--
LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In eight seconds, please do us the kindness of ducking. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yaz! They turn to see YAZ -- he levels a WEAPON AT THEM -- FIR Jay and Kay DUCK -- the weapon just misses. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's get into trouble. Jay and Kay engage him -- As they run off, the Lama calls -- LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, please, to take the bridge. And we begin BIG FIGHT SET PIECE. Try to include motorcycle and horse elements. Could also involve the actual aqueduct, which is close by. At one point, Jay and Kay seem stuck, they remember... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the bridge... They take the bridge, which gives them an advantage on Ya At one point, Jay corners Yaz -- Yaz BLASTS HIM -- Jay is knocked down. Looks DEAD! But he shakes it off reveal the PONG medallion blocked the shot. Culminating at a toxic waste dump in Staten Island, with compressed into .a six inch cube - hauled away in the bac a garbage truck. The guys give chase -- they want him captured, but no luc The truck drives off...
KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gone. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only a matter of time before he comes back. And this time he might be really mad.

dialogues.speaker: AQUEDUCT RACE TRACK
dialogues.text: Jay and Kay return to an EMPTY RACE TRACK... It's like a ghost town. No Archanans to be found... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, we lost them. They come all the way across the universe and just when we're about to figure out what all of this is about-- Then, faintly... a CHEER KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold that thought. They follow it out to THE TRACK

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is empty. No spectators, no horses. Just the Archanans... Who stand near the track watching... nothing. And yet -- They cheer and clap as if watching the most exciting race ever. Jay and Kay exchange a "what the hell?" Look and approach them. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody OK? ARCHANANS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody is everybody.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... guess I can't argue with that. So listen up -- Yaz is down but he won't be for long, so we need to start coming up with some answers. First of all-- The Archanans CHEER. Jay shakes it off. JAY (CONT'D) FIRST

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Archanans CHEER AGAIN. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you cheering about?! ARCHANANS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The races. Jay and Kay keep approaching... Puzzled -- the track is empty... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What races? Jay and Kay cross the threshold into their aura... and no The empty stands are FILLED WITH CHEERING SPECTATORS WATC AN INCREDIBLY EXCITING RACE. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we? LAMA. We are tomorrow. Jay steps backwards, out of the aura -- back to empty gho town. Steps back in -- tomorrow's rabid fans, cheering the race From the Archanans' POV -- we see ALL VERSIONS/ALL AGES O JAY AND KAY.. The effect is -- THEY SEE ALL TIME AT ONCE. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You... can see the future. LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is what you call the future.
ATTENDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, the future. An illusion of the time-bound, borne of the fallacy that one moment follows another. LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yaz suffers from this greatly. And so he must have revenge on your planet. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revenge?, For what? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He mourns the past because he can not see the dead are still as alive as they ever were. Just not now. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, someday you're gonna explain that to me, but right now you need to stop the riddles because there's about two minutes until Yaz crawls out of his hole and gets back to trying to kill you. So help me out. I need to know IN ENGLISH why Yaz is trying to kill you and what that has to do with saving the Earth. ATTENDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know what he will know. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what... he will know... (figuring it out) You know his plans. (REALIZING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you're going to stop him. He wants to kill you because you stop him. LAMA (CHEERFUL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, if he does not kill us first. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you know if he's going to? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sometimes he kills us, sometimes he does not. There are many futures.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, which future is the one where you live and the Earth doesn't blow up? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The one where you take us home. Jay and Kay exchange a look -- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, let's get these freaks home, and pronto. LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must let go of your. attachment to time, beginning with your concept of "pronto." And on that -- THUP THUP THUP -- 12 Blacked-out helicopters...

dialogues.speaker: EX, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: (MEGAPHONE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Illegal aliens -- you are surrounded... Do not attempt to flee... Jay and Kay YELL INTO THE BACKWASH OF THE ROTORS: JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! We need to get them home! But it's all drowned out in the wind and dust... MiB "squad cars" -- pull up and surround them. Jay and Kay look for an escape route -- but MiB cars and trucks seem to be pouring in from everywhere. MiB agents descend on ropes, round up the Archanans--

dialogues.speaker: EX, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: (MEGAPHONE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Kay! Return to your vehicle! Rendezvous at headquarters in 20 minutes! We will escort you by air! And from the noise and chaos of the choppers... To silence...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay and Kay watch through a glass wall. Inside the conference room -- the Archanans sit around a table. Ex paces, clearly talking ABOUT the Archanans to the othe agents. Body language tells us the MiB reach some kind of consens Ex comes out -- Jay and Kay hop up. Ex notices Jay for the first time -- EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's he doing here? Didn't we just bust you? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was someone else. All these mooners look alike, right? A beat -- and Ex buys it completely. EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... So look. We've talked about it. And you are to be commended, Agent Kay. You did a fine job bringing these illegals in. Now it's our job to get them out of the city for containment. Somewhere where if someone decides to blow them off the map, the collateral damage will be insignificant. Toronto. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they're in danger. One of the most dangerous beings in the universe is out to kill them-- (looks to Jay) And if that happens, we're all going with them, because they're our only hope of survival. EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Christ, if we listened to every Mooner who showed up telling us how they were gonna save the world, that's all we'd do. Do you know why Earth is still standing? (MORE)
EX (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why we're not a smoldering chunk of nothing? Because we don't stick our nose into other people's business. Especially people in danger, because they have enemies, and those enemies destroy Earth. Now. Are you going to execute my order or not? KAY (COLD)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought we were supposed to be the good guys. EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful, Agent Kay. That sounds like insubordination. Kay walks up to Ex, looks him DEAD IN THE EYE KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sounds like you need to cut some eyeholes in your stomach, because your head is so far up your ass, that's the only way you could possibly see. EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it. You're off this case. Stick to dry ice. If I catch you near them -- or him -- again, I'll have your badge. (to a bunch of other AGENTS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You four -- take the Archanans to transpo. One of the agents looks up-- YOUNG AGENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me? I'm just an accountant--- EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go!!! (TO JAY)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you... You just get out of here! The MiB agents GRAB the Archanans and hustle them out. Kay leans in to them-- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, we'll--
LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, we know. Kay looks up -- sees Jay smiling at him. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I knew Agent Kay wasn't just gonna lie down. So what's the plan? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard the man. We've got dry ice to investigate.

dialogues.speaker: GARBAGE COMPACTOR TRUCK
dialogues.text: It's the truck that "compacted" Yaz. We follow it to the MIDDLE OF

dialogues.speaker: GIANT STATEN ISLAND DUMP
dialogues.text: Where the truck dumps its load... Including YAZ... Who gets PROCESSED AND PRESSED INTO A CUBE. On the cube -- it begins to swell and force itself back i its natural shape. Around the piles of garbage, other Yaz parts SEEK EACH OT OUT... DUMP EXIT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Workers stop what they're doing -- get out of the way of something, disturbed. We see Yaz and understand the reaction -- Yaz might be ba together, but NOT AT ALL RIGHT -- a leg stuck in the wron place, the head at a weird angle. He catches his reflection in a hubcap and adjusts himself Pops out an eye, swaps an arm... He unfurls his tongue, smells the air -- YAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you go...
SHOWWORLD CENTER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SLEAZY GUY is suprised to see not just an agent... but agents and four Hare-Krishna-looking guys come out of his peep show window. One of the Archanan attendants smiles at him: ATTENDANT (CHEERFUL)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will die alone. SLEAZY GUY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I know. The agents lead the Archanans through the world's greates emporium of sleaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hustle and bustle -- cabs picking up and dropping off PASSENGERS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We find a LONG LINE OF UNHAPPY KIDS, MAKING UNHAPPY PAREN Kids crying, pulling on Mom's dress... We see -- it's the line to an ICE CREAM TRUCK. And the line isn't moving because KAY IS QUESTIONING THE PAPER-HATTED VENDOR. DRY ICE SMOKE rises from the freezer: KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a few more questions about dry ice and I'll be out of your hair... A BIRD CALL makes Kay turn --.he sees Jay waving him over pointing at something -- The MiB agents lead the Archanan into the Station! VENDOR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you ten times -- I got no idea what dry ice is! KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not listening). Thanks, you've been very helpful. Jay and Kay peel off, follow the MiB agents, leaving the Vendor scratching his head. He turns back to the kids. Jay and Kay follow the MiBers and Archanans inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Men in Black blend in easily with the guys going home Greenwich, but the Archanans are easy to spot. Jay and Kay tail them -- and lose them for an instant! They spot a glimpse of robe, run after them, turn a corne And it's just some Hare Krishnas. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn. Wrong freaks. But Jay spots the Archanans... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over there, Kay! As they run off -- HARE KRISHNA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps you'd like to join us for a vegetarian meal? Jay and Kay chase after the MiB agents and Archanans -- The MiB agents approach a cordoned-off area with signs warning WET PAINT! The agents look around, then slip pass the ropes and thro a NARROW DOOR marked "WET PAINT" or "MEN WORKING" Jay and Kay follow... Through the skinny half-painted door...

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE.SKINNY DOOR
dialogues.text: An EQUALLY SKINNY ESCALATOR descends 100s of feet. A problem: it's going the WRONG WAY -- bringing incognito aliens and MiB agents UP INTO GRAND CENTRAL. Jay and Kay muscle their way down -- lots of 'scuse me -- pardon me -- hey, don't grab that! But once they power past the crowds, Jay's jaw drops as w reveal...

dialogues.speaker: SECRET TRAIN STATION
dialogues.text: A MUCH-BIGGER station under Grand Central, a secret hub f sending aliens back and forth all over the country. It's basically a series of GIANT PNEUMATIC TUBES --people sized versions of the vacuum tubes that used to beeverywh in banks, offices, etc. A mix of ALIENS and MIB AGENTS put on helmets and pads, b the tubes and FWOOP off... Quick shots -- a shoeshine stand set up for many-limbed aliens... a newsstand with strange papers... The Beatles line for Liverpool with a blue meanie... Kareem Abdul- Jabbar... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On your 2 o'clock. They spot the MiBers and the Archanans next to the TUBE T CANADA.

dialogues.speaker: TUBE TO CANADA
dialogues.text: The MiB agents put helmets and pads on the Archanans. They're about to load them into the tubes -- Jay and Kay approach: KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold up. MIB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're off this case, Kay. MIB 2

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but I heard there's some dry ice in Queens. Magic show at a kid's birthday party. Better hustle, you can get there before. the cake. They all LAUGH at Kay. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Change in plans. MIB

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? We didn't hear about any change in plans.
KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, Ex just gave us the new orders -- check this out -- Kay gestures them closer -- he reaches for something in h jacket pocket... The MiBers lean in... And Kay GRABS THEM AND SHOVES THEM BACKWARDS TOWARDS THE

dialogues.speaker: TUBE
dialogues.text: The MiB agents stumble, surprised -- The Archanans, not surprised, step deftly out of the way, MiBers FWOOP FWOOP FWOOP into the tube... Jay and Kay exchange a smile and realize... One last VERY YOUNG agent is still standing there, wide-eyed: YOUNG AGENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't hurt me! I'm just the accountant! He reaches for his radio... Jay talks him down: JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you're a little freaked out and you want to call for backup, but listen: When you've done this job for a while, you realize there's one rule -- things aren't what they seem. These are innocent beings that need our protection. Are you gonna do the right thing or are you gonna be a company man and send them off to die in Toronto? The young agent thinks -- puts down the radio. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good, good. What's your name? YOUNG AGENT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Zed, sir. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna be okay, kid. Jay can't help laughing --
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gonna be better than OK. I'm not gonna give you so much shit anymore. The radio CRACKLES --

dialogues.speaker: EX, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: (ON RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Zed, what's your status? ZED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Detainees are on the tube to Toronto. No sign of Kay. Over.

dialogues.speaker: EX, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Copy that, good work, Zed. Zed crosses off... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be nice to him. Trust me. Jay, Kay and the Archanans regroup. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, you all wanted to go home. Well here we are. So how do you want to get off this rock? You guys have the spaceport on Long Island yet? Kay just looks at him. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That place is a dump anyway. Best Margaritas in the Universe, my ass. What about the one in Ohio? The Archanans smile. ATTENDANT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here is the way home. The Lama removes a postcard-sized card from his robe and hands it to one of his attendants. The attendant bows, and RITUALLY PASSES IT... it passes through all the attendants and then to JAY. Jay gives it a look. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, huh? You're sure?
LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only future that ends with life begins there. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take that as a strong "yes." Okay, then. Follow me. Jay pockets the card and starts herding them across the terminal. Kay catches up -- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are we going? Jay looks at him a beat. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Omaha. And I'm gonna buy you the biggest T-bone you ever saw when we get there. So -- you head over to the Omaha tube and I'm gonna help these guys over here for a second. But I'll meet you in a minute. By the Omaha tube. They stare at each other -- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sounds good. See you there. Kay turns to head off -- then, lightening fast, spins and reaches into Jay's pocket, snatches out the card -- KAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Omaha, my ass. Kay looks at the card: GREETINGS FROM SUNNY FLORIDA -- a tourist post card with palm trees, oranges and beaches. KAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no. No way. Florida, Kay. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what it says. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you get it? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it's hot and muggy. The old people drive slow. (MORE)
KAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll stay somewhere air- conditioned and only drive after three when they're at dinner. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is why you were there. In Florida. Because of them. You were helping them and that's why... that's why you get killed. Today, July 16. I saw the report myself. Agent Kay, dead at the scene. Killed by Yaz. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what an MiB agent calls it when he faces death? Besides I got you to watch my back, right? They walk to the FLORIDA TUBE JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just want you to know, I'm doing this out of love, man. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doing what? He gets his answer -- Jay DECKS HIM. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You stay home and stay alive. But Kay isn't down. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told them I'd help them -- I'm honor-bound to do it. Kay throws a DIRTY SUCKER-PUNCH to Jay's kidney. Jay recovers and throws an UPPERCUT to Kay's solar plexus Jay winces -- like he just hit something hard. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, you used to have some abs. They continue to pound each other. As they trade punches: JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't let you go to Florida. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I make my own future! Besides -- I'm younger and stronger than you!
They both attempt an identical spin kick at the same time feet collide. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bet you're sorry you taught me that. The fight continues... They're wearing down, circling eac other... And then Kay fakes a left --- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You always lead with your-- But this time Kay connects with his right, knocking Jay d hard. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Had enough yet? On Jay -- gasping, spent -- using every last reserve of strength to lift himself off that floor. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't let you go -- I love you! Jay KICKS KAY SAVAGELY IN THE GROIN. Kay LUNGES AT JAY. They CLINCH... it's a stalemate... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, hell, look at that-- behind you- JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not falling for that. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not kidding -- Kay rotates their clinch towards the tube so Jay can see. The ARCHANANS -- very cheerfully, benignly hopping into t FLORIDA TUBE. Jay and Kay share a look -- and both run INTO THE TUBE!

dialogues.speaker: THROUGH THE TUBES
dialogues.text: Jay, Kay and the Archanans hurtle through the MiB system pneumatic tubes.

The Archanans fly through the tubes, relaxed and happy, moving gracefully, like fish through water... Kay is in perfect controlled tube position -- everything clenched, hands by his sides, looking like he's in an "ai luge"... Jay is SCREAMING and ricocheting off the sides of the tub like a pinball... They shoot SOUTH, passing landmarks of the Eastern seaboard... Intercut with Jay's face -- blown back like Right Stuff astronauts in a G-Force simulator. Jay FLAILS towards the Archanans, grabs onto the Lama's r JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yelling over the wind NOISE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to know -- can I really prevent Kay's murder? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Okay, then. Thanks, good to hear. LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But where there was death, there will be death. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does that mean? The Lama smiles and zips ahead through the current. Jay g CLOBBERED by a bend in the tube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sugar cane workers pick crops next to a GIANT IRRIGATION PIPE. They look up as SCREAMS DOPPLER THROUGH THE PIPE -- what hell was that? We follow the SCREAM...

dialogues.speaker: BACK IN THE TUBE
dialogues.text: Jay CONTINUES TO SCREAM --

dialogues.speaker: TUBE P.A., (V.0.)
dialogues.text: All passengers, prepare to de-tube. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: De-tube?

dialogues.speaker: TUBE P.A., (V.0.)
dialogues.text: Please make sure all helmet and crash suit straps are securely fastened. On Jay -- no helmet, no crash suit. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helmet? No one said anything about A--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay, Kay and the Archanans are launched from the tube lik human cannonballs... The Archanans land gracefully, floating down air currents like kung fu masters... Kay hits with both feet and rolls... Jay face plants into the water. Jay looks up -- FIVE MANATEES STARE HIM DOWN. The ALPHA MANATEE emits along, lowing manatee song which RESOLVES I COUGHING -- ALPHA MANATEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry, I have something in my throat. They went that way... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. Surrounded by thick brush, trees. Jay staggers out of the water, looking beat to hell. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay? Archanans? Everyone OK?
Reveal -- Everyone else looks clean and pressed. Jay look around -- nothing but brush and swamp. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen, your, uh... Arachaness...ness? I don't think this here is the way back to your planet. The Archanans smile and WALK OFF... Jay and Kay follow -- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey wait -- we can't help you get home, if you don't tell us how... He trails off as they EMERGE FROM THE BRUSH And stop dead... JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa. So that's how you're getting home. Reveal -- A GLORIOUS SHOT OF THE APOLLO ROCKET And they head towards destiny...

dialogues.speaker: CAPE CANAVERAL
dialogues.text: Jay and Kay take in the MASSIVE SCENE... The huge crowd, the security, the press. HISTORY IN THE MAKING. T-Minus 30 minutes. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. So we've got... 30 minutes to get past security. Get into Mission Control. Reprogram the flight path, pull the Astronauts off the launch and get them in that rocket. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, then. Better get started. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weird. I feel like I've been here. (BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, I've got a plan to get through security. We just need to be invisible.

dialogues.speaker: YAZ ON HIS BIKE
dialogues.text: Hurtling down the highway on his superfast bike, kicking HUGE DUSTSTORM... He gets STUCK BEHIND AN 18-WHEELER. Yaz REVS -- and SPEED RIGHT THROUGH THE TRUCK, SPLITTING IT IN HALF. Down the CAUSEWAY -- the rocket in the distance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heavily guarded by AIR FORCE SECURITY -- people with a lo guns and very little sense of humor. And up steps Jay, leading Kay and the Archanans.

dialogues.speaker: JAY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: 'Scuse me... I need to get inside... I've got the big man's Cadillac... all washed and ready to- Before the words are out of Jay's mouth, he's down on the ground with a submachine gun stuck in his neck. GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move and it's the last thing you do! The security is on Kay and the Archanans, forcing them do Kay gives Jay a look -- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good work. It's like we're not even here. GUARD (INTO RADIO)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, this is unit 3 bravo -- we have an attempted perimeter breach into mission control subhallway Charlie. One caucasian, one negroid, four... other. Yes, sir. We'll hold them here, sir. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've got it wrong, let me explain-
GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up! Anything you have to say, you can say to my superior officer! And boy does he hate your kind... A click... click... click... Someone is approaching. Some who walks like they mean business. GUARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lt. Colonel! Here are the intruders, sir! Jay cranes to see the Colonel -- he's African American. J grins, relieved -- JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, someone I can talk to-- But the Colonel is on him before you can blink, an equal- opportunity hardass to the extreme: COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only thing we're gonna talk about is what specific breed of dumbass you have to be to try to penetrate my launch site! He begins patting Jay down. Eyes widen -- COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weapon! You are going away for a long time... (to his men) Get them into holding. We'll interrogate them after the launch. A beat... and Jay goes for it: JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, before you do that --- my name is Agent Jay. I appreciate your position, but I'm from a top-secret government agency in charge of protecting the world from the scum of the universe and right now, on behalf of the people of Earth, I.: need to commandeer your rocket so THEY--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (points to Archanans) --can board it. Can we count on your help? The Colonel stares at him for a beat..
COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you want us to stop the most massive endeavor in American history, an event being watched by the entire world, the moment that will be the culmination of a challenge put to us by President John F. Kennedy himself... so a bunch of Hare Krishnas can take a joy ride? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Would it help if I told you I'm from the future? COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get them out of here! He motions to the other MPs, who move to roust the group. But the Lama takes the Colonel by the arm-- COLONEL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! --and PULLS HIM INTO HIS AURA. On THE COLONEL'S face... He sees something POWERFUL The Lama releases him... The officer is stunned for a moment. Blinks back into foc and turns to the other guards -- COLONEL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You men are no longer needed here. Report to delta gate. GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir? COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go! GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir... The Colonel turns to Jay, Kay and the Archanans: COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of you, come with me. The Colonel heads into the building. They follow.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Things change when you can see the future, right? COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They sure do. This is definitely about some next-level shit. The PA crackles:

dialogues.speaker: P.A., (V.0.)
dialogues.text: T-minus seven minutes to launch...

dialogues.speaker: MISSION CONTROL STRUCTURE
dialogues.text: Mission control is an underground hub with hallway "spoke Jay, Kay and the Archanans follow the Colonel down the hallway towards the main Mission Control center. MISSION CONTROL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hive of activity leading up to the launch.. Miles and miles of white guys in buzzcuts and shortsleeve button-do shirts. Thick glasses, slide rules, pocket protectors -- sea of IBM men. Everyone smoking, RUSHING AROUND, LAST-MINUTE CHAOS... Hunkered over computer monitors... reel-to-reel data tape spinning. Less computing power than an iPhone, but we put man on the moon.

dialogues.speaker: P.A., (V.0.)
dialogues.text: T-minus six minutes... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Attention, everyone! We've got a change in plans! Everyone's consumed with the launch and wearing headsets they ignore him -- he keeps trying -- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Attention over here! I need to talk to the man who can re- program this rocket! Still nothing -- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can anyone hear me? Hey! You in the glasses!
25 people in identical giant black plastic glasses turn.

dialogues.speaker: COLONEL, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Agent Jay! Over here! They see the Colonel with an Engineer at a workstation. COLONEL (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your man. The guys approach the Engineer -- ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see this card? The rocket's flight path is all on cards just like this one. Right here -- He indicates a long metal rack, like a mail-sorting machi that holds many 1000s of cards and feeds them into a processor. An Archanan approaches and BLOWS ON THE CARDS -- it hits cards like a mini-whirlwind. The cards spiral everywhere like bats pouring out of a cave -- chads fly off -- they' magically re-programmed! And fly back into the rack. The engineers are STUNNED. And then PANIC: ENGINEER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The trajectory has been altered! A BIG LOW-TECH GRAPHIC APPEARS on the BIG LOW-RES MONITOR TRAJECTORY CHANGE. ENGINEER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Abort launch! Abort launch! JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down there! Everyone be cool! ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Coolness is an inappropriate response! The Engineer flips the SAFETY off a red button marked "AB ENGINEER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aborting in 5... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Stop! Do not abort! ENGINEER
The Engineer raises his ABORTING HAND -- About to slam it down in the button! - KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This might help. Kay reaches into his jacket, takes out WHAT APPEARS TO BE NEURALIZER JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? You been holding out on me? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little something I've been working on. Glasses if you've got 'em. Jay and Kay put on their glasses... ENGINEER
Jay and Kay in sunglasses -- for a moment, it's the iconi look of the posters... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha ha, just like old times... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and you might want to get under a desk. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get under a--? ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One! The engineers hand comes down... but before he can hit th BUTTON --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay hits the trigger -- But instead of a FLASH -- A MILLION PELLETS EXPLODE OUT OF THE NEURALIZER -- bounci everywhere, knocking out the engineers. The pellets KEEP WHIZZING EVERYWHERE THROUGH THE FOLLOWIN Jay and Kay have to talk over the sounds of people gettin KO'd.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell was that?? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a high-velocity non-lethal pellet-gun. The boys in the lab call it the "hiv-nol-pog." JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catchy. The Archanans deftly step out of the way -- or the pellet swerve around them. EX RUNS IN, flanked by security and/or MiB agents. EX

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Kay! There he is! Take him down! Shoot him if you have to! EX catches a PELLET TO THE GROIN, crumples. The pellets settle... quiet...

dialogues.speaker: P.A., (V.0.)
dialogues.text: T-minus... Five minutes. The engineers start COMING TO, dazed, wondering WHAT THE JUST HAPPENED -- Kay and Jay give them a "neuralizer" cov STORY: JAY (TO CROWD)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell is wrong with you people? Raquel Welch comes by for a personal tour of Mission Control and you faint like a bunch of schoolgirls! KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a waste. ENGINEER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Raquel Welch was here? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five minutes to get to the rocket. And keep your eyes open for Yaz. They head out. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: ON THE TARMAC
dialogues.text: With only a few minutes to go, service trucks CLEAR THE TARMAC -- dozens of fuel trucks, etc., Driving to get a s distance away from the blast. The all SWERVE OUT OF THE WAY As one car cuts through them GOING THE OPPOSITE WAY, part the waters -- it's a military jeep -- THE COLONEL at the wheel, Jay, Kay and the rest, barely hanging on. CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: ASTRONAUT TRANSPORT
dialogues.text: The apollo astronauts ride across the tarmac towards the rocket. The only car. Looking up at that rocket. On NEIL ARMSTRONG, practicing: NEIL ARMSTRONG (GRANDIOSE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's one little step that I did, one big step for the rest of you... Wait, that's not it. Did that sound weird to you guys? The driver SLAMS ON THE BRAKES BUZZ ALDRIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What in Sam Hill is going on? Reveal the Jeep, pulled in front of the Astronauts, cutti them off. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No disrespect meant, [major]. I'm a big fan. (Especially of the haircut.) JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we've got some bigger fish to fry. Hand over the flight suits. They start pulling the astronauts off the truck. The astronauts protest. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go, people. Why don't you take one giant leap out of there.
They look at Jay and Kay... at the Colonel... COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right, gentlemen. You need to listen to them. We're going to protocol twelve. The astronauts acquiesce. BUZZ ALDRIN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't want to get in that death trap anyways. NEIL ARMSTRONG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still getting my parade, right? CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same guards who stopped Jay and Kay are back on duty. They hear something -- they draw weapons -- And it's Yaz. Still looking like evil incarnate. The guar take in this unholy picture... GUARD WHAT THE-- YAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want in. The guards look at each other -- GUARD

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should we radio the Colonel? GUARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna get yelled at again? They wave him by. GUARD (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. LAUNCH PLATFORM

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay loads the Archanans into the capsule., Technicians in clean suits assist.
Jay works like a secret service agent -- scanning for all possible threats. Jay checks his stop watch -- Four minutes to go... Kay works'with the Archanans-- JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We good yet, Kay? I don't like being out here in the open -- too many ways for Yaz to get to you... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm almost there. Kay's got them inside, but having problems with the hatch KAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, tech guys -- get back here and help me with the door. TECH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's called-a hatch. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever, just get over here. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on -- what's going on? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This door is complicated. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, for... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? It's an Apollo rocket, not a Plymouth Valiant, OK? It's complicated. Jay goes over to help Kay with the door. They both fuss and fight over the door. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lift it. You have to lift it. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I am lifting it. You have to hold the lever.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, if I hold the lever, the rubber thingie won't... go in the thing where the thingie goes... Kay notices something in the reflection of the hatch glas KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay... Why do you think a highly trained NASA technician would leave the back of his suit unzipped? They exchange a look that parallels the opening scene in Chinese restaurant... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it's about to go down. They turn around, draw weapons on the tech -- it's YAZ!

dialogues.speaker: NOTE TO READER
dialogues.text: Welcome to the good stuff From here, we launch into a GIANT SET PIECE that will tak up and around the Apollo Rocket... As Jay and Kay battle Yaz and Devil Girl in a super-high- stakes confrontation to protect the Archanans... We will pay off that YAZ ISAVIRUS, bentonDESTROYINGTHE EARTH to avenge the deaths ofhis brothers --smallpoxand bubonic plague. The launch clock ticks down -- the action moves around pi breathing fire, the gigantic scaffolding, liquid oxygen spewing from the rocket... All on top of a rocket taller a 30-story skyscraper. With T-minus 25 seconds to go, Jay and Kay corner Yaz aga the lunar capsule.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Yaz laughs at Jay and Kay. YAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't stop me! Nothing on Earth can stop me! JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing now. Yaz raises an eyebrow...
Jay draws his NOISY CRICKET -- the gun he brought from th future. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little something I brought with me. Jay points the gun at Yaz -- but Yaz just LAUGHS -- As the clock ticks down to T-minus 5... 4... YAZ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try it! You wouldn't dare! One false shot and you'll rip space and time! JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a chance I'll have to take. Jay BLASTS YAZ Yaz stumbles BACK INTO THE CAPSULE... The hatch SLAMS him Just as the ROCKET BEGINS LIFTOFF--

dialogues.speaker: HUGE FLAMES
dialogues.text: KAY - KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh oh -- But the Archanans surround them with their aura -- where flames and smoke flow harmlessly around them... And then it's over...

dialogues.speaker: BIG VICTORY MOMENT
dialogues.text: As they watch the rocket carry Yaz off... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We did it, partner. I hope you remember this when you recruit me -- you won't give me such a hard time. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know I will. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.
KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess we'll have to build a prison on the moon or something. Jay realizes -- grabs Kay -- JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do a better job this time, OK? That needs to be one hell of a prison. You don't want that guy coming back, or I'm coming back. Look, once was enough, OK? Jay turns to The Colonel -- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for your help, sir. Hope we don't get you fired. COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not too worried about that. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I ask you -- what did the Lama show you in there that made you help us? Was it the Earth being destroyed? COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No -- it was my son. All grown up. As a matter of fact, I'm late to see him -- I promised I'd watch the launch with him. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Thanks. He's a lucky kid. COLONEL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm a lucky dad. Take care. Jay offers him a handshake. The officer takes it -- and pulls Jay into a hug. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... The Colonel leaves. Jay and Kay congratulate each other, smile over a job well done... But then they see the Archanans... And realize...
KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're sorry we didn't get you home, guys. It was the only way to get rid of Yaz. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we'll make sure you're safe here. And the next rocket out... LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All is well. You have done well. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No we didn't. You wanted to go home... LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is what we desire and what must be... And now our gift to you... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gift? But we didn't get you home. ARCHANANS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is the action and there is the intention. It is the intention we reward. LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did the right thing. And if humans are capable of such sacrifice, such friendship... perhaps we ARE already home. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So then what's the gift? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You already have it. Jay looks at pong. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This? Pong? LAMA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. PONG. The Pan-Galactic Ordnance Negation Grid. Agent Kay will use this technology... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To make the missile defense system. You use this to save the world.
ARCHANANS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Don't drop it. They take the PONG and drape it around Kay's neck The Archanans leave, chanting... ARCHANANS (CONT'D) (CHANTING)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bip... Bip... Bip... And it's just Jay and Kay. Jay looks at Kay wearing the PONG... just like in the cas file picture... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. My watch stopped. We see -- a minute to go. Jay looks at the watch. Somethi about it bothers him... KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon. Let's go watch that bastard leave the atmosphere. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'll catch up with you in a second.

dialogues.speaker: KAY GETS INTO THE ELEVATOR
dialogues.text: Jay hangs back, approaches the Archanans, walks them down scaffolding. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you guys understand all this time stuff, right? So is everything going to be okay now? I mean, if I saved everything, and Yaz is really gone, why am I even here? Shouldn't I not have come in the first place? And why do I still have time left on my watch? UNDERGROUND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scaffolding leads Jay and the Archanans into the maze underground hallways. Jay walks, looking at his watch, thinking...
,He sees a WALL CLOCK -- 3:59. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 3:59. But Kay didn't get killed until... And then the AWFUL REALIZATION -- JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't come yet! Kay, he didn't come yet!!! Jay races to find Kay. WITH KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unaware that his appointment with death is near...

dialogues.speaker: WITH YAZ AND DEVIL GIRL
dialogues.text: Racing down a hallway... hunting Kay... WITH JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Running... running... searching... where is Kay? INTERCUT BETWEEN KAY... YAZ... JAY... All converging on destiny... WITH JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Running... more frantic now... And then he sees him! Kay -- at the end of the hallway!. Backlit by the door to the outside... JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kay! And then Jay sees -- Yazl Already there! Jay goes for his weapon, but he doesn't have the shot! Yaz pulls his guns...

Kay turns to see Yaz -- there's no time to react, only to know HE'S ABOUT TO DIE! Yaz FIRES!! But -- THE COLONEL is somehow there instead! He catches t bullet for Kay -- his body dematerializes. And it gives Jay the split-second he needs to FIRE ON YAZ KILL HIM, blowing him OUTSIDE -- where he is INCINERATED LIQUID OXYGEN leftover from the launch. They look at each other -- it's over. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? I knew you had my back. Jay hears footsteps. Looks up and sees the SHADOW OF A TA MAN -- REMARKABLY SIMILAR TO JAY'S OWN SILHOUETTE. As the footsteps approach, the shadow grows smaller, shrinking to KID SIZE. It's a boy. KID'S VOICE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad? What's going on? The kid steps into the light -- backlit -- but from the s of his head and Jay's reaction, this kid could only be YO JAY. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where there is death, there will always be death. He saved your life. He swapped his for yours. He saved the world. Kay puts a firm hand on Jay -- KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take it from here. Kay steps away... but turns back. In a replay of the moment from the first movie, Jay tosse Kay a modern Neuralizer. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave me some memories this time,

dialogues.speaker: OK
dialogues.text: KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure, partner. I'll see you around.
JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes you will. Kay turns back to the boy, takes his hand. Jay watches them from a distance: Kay takes something off the ground where The Colonel's bo was -- hands it to the son. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, look -- your Dad wanted you to have this. Kay gives the kid a shiny new commemorative Apollo key ch Jay looks in his pocket -- the same key chain, scratched worn. YOUNG JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your daddy had to go -- he's part of the space program, now. He's okay, he just had to take a trip up to the stars, but you'll be just fine. I'll keep an eye on you... They are silhouetted by the bright light of the Apollo launch... Jay takes out his iPhone and ALL GOES WHITE... PURE WHITE LIGHT... And it resolves into... NEW YORK - BACK TO PRESENT DAY... Jay comes to in the Apple Store, looks to the sky and

dialogues.speaker: THE MISSILES ARE STILL COMING
dialogues.text: JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Noo!!!! And then... A giant PONG PADDLE rises over the horizon and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay is walking on air -- thrilled to see the deadpan secu guard. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to see you, man. He gives him a hug-- gets a "what the hell?" face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jay is thrilled to be back -- hugging everyone he can. No one else knows what he's talking about -- from their P he never left... It all seems the same except for quick s of Ex the bitter janitor, aged Devil Girl pushing the cof cart... Jay bounces through the MiB HQ -- it's just a regular day everyone else, but it's HOME SWEET HOME to Jay. He even gives the worm guys a big, gushy hug. A crowd of people gathers around Kay, congratulating him winning the Bowling trophy... AGAIN. Kay looks up -- SMILES BIG when he sees Jay. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, everyone, give me and my partner here a minute. They leave the guys alone. A beat -- and Jay just wraps h in THE BIGGEST HUG EVER. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's good to see you, man. So good. I just... do you remember... I mean, do you know what I've been through? Kay just stares at him. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean, do I remember that you travelled back in time to save my life and the world? Not bad, slick. Not bad. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem. You'd do the same for me. I just have one question... (MORE)
JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When you disappeared... Why didn't I forget you when everyone else did? KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I don't know exactly. Because I was dead. But in a quantum reality, objects can exist in contradictory states... So multiple timelines with varying probabilities can exist, and the one you're closest to MATHEMATICALLY-- JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you're talking about our closeness... you're talking about our love... Across timelines! You're saying our love will go on! Kay swats him away -- but the love couldn't be more clear Jay feels something in his pocket -- the keychain. Takes out. JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was a good man. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes he was. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm glad I know that. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you travelled back in time, huh? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow. And you didn't change anything? JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure? Because the littlest thing can have huge repercussions. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was very careful.
KAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good man, good man. Well, let's get you a uniform. JAY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me? We PULL BACK -- Revealing PRESENT DAY MIB IN ALL ITS KICKASS GRANDEUR. Eternally vigilant in the struggle to protect the Earth a all its inhabitants... And every one of those agents wearing BLUE SUITS WITH SHO JAY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even I can't make that look good. FADE TO BLACK.
